p: The allochthonous ethnophytonymy index is 18.05%, between Giron√®s (4.7%) [ 17] and Mallorca (27.8%) [ 58] values. The reason for this quite high value in a rural district is the origin of one of the interviewees, who is from Germany but has lived in the Garrigues district for a long time, although she only speaks Spanish, not Catalan.
